# The `node_parent_access` Class Template Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Mixin base class that is used to add <em><a href="#ac9bd35890bb3a7a1a7afb45940ab46c6">getParent()</a></em> and <em><a href="#ad4cf5562c8c361844baaeb6a8b5cfb7e">setParent(ParentTy&#42;)</a></em> methods to <em><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ilist-node-impl">ilist&#95;node&#95;impl</a></em> iff <em><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/ilist-parent">ilist&#95;parent</a></em> has been set in the list options. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

Mixin base class that is used to add <em><a href="#ac9bd35890bb3a7a1a7afb45940ab46c6">getParent()</a></em> and <em><a href="#ad4cf5562c8c361844baaeb6a8b5cfb7e">setParent(ParentTy&#42;)</a></em> methods to <em><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ilist-node-impl">ilist&#95;node&#95;impl</a></em> iff <em><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/ilist-parent">ilist&#95;parent</a></em> has been set in the list options.
